metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30797 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
This issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in iOS14.7, Safari 14.1.2, macOS Big Sur 11.5, watchOS 7.6, tvOS 14.7. Processingmaliciously crafted web content may lead to code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
webkit2gtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
